item.title: Symfony Form Theme for PrestaShop
item.description: Symfony Form Theme for PrestaShop PrestaShop usage PrestaShop relies on Twig’s FormRenderer, which requires a Form Theme to function. Bootstrap 4 Form Theme is a popular one. The Form Theme is a set of Twig macros and functions that provide a way to render the different parts of a form: every label, input type, and specific option has its own macro.
